title: KPAW 2-in-1 Automatic Card Shuffler & Dealer - Support 12 Players, 4 Drawing Remotes, Built-in Gameplays, 360°/180° Deal, Adjustable Dealing Distance, for Poker, UNO, Phase 10, Skip-Bo, Rummy (Black)
features: [2-IN-1 SHUFFLING & DEALING] – The MAX 6 2-in-1 Automatic Card Shuffler & Dealer innovatively combines card shuffling and dealing in one machine. With just one single press, the machine automatically shuffles and then deals as you set. It gets rid of the hassle of manual shuffling, ensuring smooth and error-free gameplay for poker, UNO, Phase 10, Skip-Bo, Five Crowns, Crazy Eights, etc.

[SUPPORTS UP TO 12 PLAYERS] – Accommodating up to 12 players makes it ideal for larger gatherings like family game nights or friend meetups. Custom settings allow you to adjust the number of cards and players, supporting a wide variety of poker games like Blackjack, Texas Hold'em, Rummy, and Bridge with a fair and engaging experience.

[CUSTOM DEALING OPTIONS] – Tailor your gameplay with the MAX 6 2-in-1 Automatic Card Shuffler & Dealer’s customizable dealing features. Adjust card count, direction, and dealing distance based on the game you’re playing. Whether it’s Poker, UNO, or Five Crowns, this machine adapts to card games worldwide, offering flexibility for a variety of game rules.

[WIRELESS DRAWING REMOTES] – The 4 included drawing remotes let players draw cards remotely by simply pressing the remote, perfect for games like UNO, Rummy and Phase 10 which need to draw cards frequently. Paired for each player, the machine automatically draws a card in the direction of the corresponding paired remote position when press the remote, making it easier to manage card drawing during a game.

[ADAPTS TO MULTIPLE CARD SIZES] – The retractable card baffle and open-sided trays handle different card sizes, from standard poker decks to specialty games like Canasta or UNO. Its adjustable design ensures smooth operation with various card types, making it a versatile tool for worldwide players.

[QUIET OPERATION] – Unlike noisy alternatives, the MAX 6 2-in-1 Automatic Card Shuffler & Dealer operates with lower noise, maintaining a calm atmosphere for players. This makes it perfect for extended game sessions, social gatherings, or family nights where a peaceful environment is key to player enjoyment.

[RECHARGEABLE BATTERY] – Equipped with a long-lasting rechargeable battery, the MAX 6 2-in-1 Automatic Card Shuffler and Dealer can handle up to 150 decks on a single full charge. Say goodbye to disposable batteries and the waste they cause. With its rechargeable design, it’s always ready for extended game sessions while being eco-friendly.
description: Product Description Say farewell to time-consuming manual shuffling and hello to quick, efficient card mixing at the touch of a button. Compact and easy to use, this device ensures fair play and saves you valuable game time. Perfect for game nights with friends and family. Get ready to elevate your card games with convenience and fun rolled into one innovative gadget! Multiple dealing methods make the game more flexible 360° Deal for 12 Players 360° Rotating Deal The KPAW MAX 6 2-in-1 Automatic Card Shuffler & Dealer is engineered to support large gatherings with its innovative 12-player 360° deal feature. This setting allows the machine to automatically deal cards in a full circle, accommodating up to 12 players at once. Whether you’re hosting a game night with family or friends, the 360° deal ensures that every player receives their cards swiftly and accurately. Perfect for card games that involve multiple players like Poker, UNO, or Phase 10, this feature enhances fairness and efficiency, keeping the game moving without any manual interference. With the KPAW MAX 6 2-in-1 Automatic Card Shuffler & Dealer, handling large groups has never been easier. 180° Deal for 8 Players Back-Forth Deal For smaller games, the KPAW MAX 6 2-in-1 Automatic Card Shuffler & Dealer offers a 180° deal mode, ideal for setups with up to 8 players . This option ensures that cards are dealt evenly across half the table, providing more focused distribution for intimate gatherings. Whether you're playing Texas Hold'em, Blackjack, Skip-Bo, or Rummy, the 180° deal function delivers the same level of accuracy and speed, without wasting time or cards. It’s a flexible option that adjusts to your group size, ensuring smooth gameplay with fewer players while maintaining the same professional-grade performance. Adjustable Dealing Distance Dealing Distance Far Mid Close Adapt your gameplay to different table sizes and game rules with the KPAW MAX 6 2-in-1 Automatic Card Shuffler & Dealer’s adjustable dealing distance with options "Far", "Mid", and "Close" . This feature allows you to customize how far the machine deals cards, accommodating tables in different sizes. Whether you’re playing a fast-paced poker game on a compact table or a leisurely round of cards on a larger surface, the KPAW MAX 6 2-in-1 Automatic Card Shuffler & Dealer ensures precise card placement every time. Adjusting the dealing distance adds a layer of versatility, making this machine suitable for various environments — from home game nights to professional card tournaments. Enjoy enhanced control over your gameplay with this customizable feature. Details Borderless Display The KPAW MAX 6 2-in-1 Automatic Card Shuffler & Dealer features a sleek, borderless display that offers a clean and uninterrupted view of the machine's settings. With easy-to-read information, the display guides users through every step of the card shuffling and dealing process for a seamless gaming experience. Suspension Needle Designed to prevent shuffled cards from scattering, the suspension needle holds and organizes cards as they fall into place. This ensures a neat arrangement of shuffled cards, keeping them ready for dealing and minimizing disruption to the game flow. Visible Window The machine’s transparent visible window allows players to observe the shuffling process in real-time. Not only does this enhance user confidence by offering visibility, but it also helps prevent potential cheating by allowing a clear view of the card movements inside. Card Conveyor Wheels Equipped with 4 high-quality silicone conveyor wheels, the KPAW MAX 6 2-in-1 Automatic Card Shuffler & Dealer provides smooth and efficient shuffling. These soft, yet durable wheels ensure that cards are shuffled with precision, reducing wear and tear on the cards while enhancing shuffling performance. Compatible with Various Card Sizes & Customized Gameplay Custom Custom Texas Hold'em Bridge (4/13/0) The KPAW MAX 6 2-in-1 Automatic Card Shuffler & Dealer allows you to customize your gameplay for any card game by adjusting key settings like player count, card per player count, and community card count. This versatile mode is ideal for users who want to play games outside of the preset options or create new house rules. You can tailor the dealing process to suit your specific game requirements, ensuring flexibility and a unique gaming experience. Use the intuitive menu to adjust settings such as the number of players, dealing speed, and dealing direction. Texas Hold'em Custom Texas Hold'em Bridge (4/13/0) The preset Texas Hold'em mode streamlines the classic poker experience, making it simple to play with up to 8 players. After selecting Texas Hold'em from the gameplay menu, set the number of players and begin dealing. The machine will automatically deal 2 hole cards to each player and prompt you through each betting round: the Flop, Turn, and River. With automatic dealing of burn cards and community cards, the KPAW MAX 6 2-in-1 Automatic Card Shuffler & Dealer enhances the pace and flow of the game, allowing players to focus on strategy and action, without worrying about manual dealing errors. Bridge Custom Texas Hold'em Bridge (4/13/0) The Bridge preset is designed for the traditional 4-player game format. Simply select Bridge from the preset options and the machine will deal 13 cards to each player automatically. With this mode, there's no need to manually count or distribute the cards, allowing for a seamless start to your Bridge session. The KPAW MAX 6 2-in-1 Automatic Card Shuffler & Dealer ensures fair and precise dealing, so you can focus entirely on the game. Great Choice To Enjoy Games Have fun with family and friends anytime, anywhere The portable card shuffler and dealer is designed for convenience, allowing you to enjoy your favorite card games anytime and anywhere. Its compact size makes it easy to carry, whether you're heading to a friend's house, camping, or just relaxing at the park. Say goodbye to tedious manual shuffling and dealing and hello to effortless fun with friends and family, no matter where you are!
